to_address: "Speakup is a screen review system for Linux." <speakup@braille.uwo.ca>
subject: Fedora Live & Orca
body:
Hello List,
I burned a "Live CD" of Fedora with Orca.
I have not figured out how to call up Orca, and I have been searching the 
WWW for the answer and have not found it.
I did not find it on the CD either.
Any suggestions?
Thanks in advance.
Glenn
